testcase.brief: STA roaming between AP1(portal) to AP2(portal), both wifi0
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -AP1 and AP2 are roaming neighbours -cofnig the same ssid on both APs, wpa-802.1x, assign a user-profile to this ssid, STA’s vlan is different from AP’s vlan -bind the ssid to wifi0
Test Procedure: -STA1 connects to ssid on AP1, result 1,2 -STA1 roams to ssid on AP2, result 2

step.desc: -AP1:cofnig the same ssid on both AP1, wpa-802.1x, assign a user-profile to this ssid, STA’s vlan is different from AP’s vlan
step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "ntp server ${pub.ntp.ip}" -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}"

step.desc: -AP1:cofnig the same ssid on both AP1, wpa-802.1x, assign a user-profile to this ssid, STA’s vlan is different from AP’s vlan
step.ssh: -v "cle log bu" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object autoap" -v "security-object autoap default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object autoap security protocol-suite wpa2-aes-8021x" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object autoap" -v "user-profile vlan${tb.vlan2}" -v "user-profile vlan${tb.vlan2} vlan-id ${tb.vlan2} attribute 1" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "_debug auth all" -v "save config"

step.desc: show interface wifi0.1 info on ap1
-AP2:cofnig the same ssid on both AP2, wpa-802.1x, assign a user-profile to this ssid, STA’s vlan is different from AP’s vlan
step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "ntp server ${pub.ntp.ip}" -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}"

step.desc: -AP2:cofnig the same ssid on both AP2, wpa-802.1x, assign a user-profile to this ssid, STA’s vlan is different from AP’s vlan
step.ssh: -v "cle log bu" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object autoap" -v "security-object autoap default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object autoap security protocol-suite wpa2-aes-8021x" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object autoap" -v "user-profile vlan${tb.vlan2}" -v "user-profile vlan${tb.vlan2} vlan-id ${tb.vlan2} attribute 1" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name} shutdown" -v "_debug auth all" -v "save config"

step.desc: show interface wifi0.1 info on ap2

step.log-match: -c -i "Roaming entry is got from neighbor AP: *${ap1.wifi0.1.mac}"
-c -i "Roaming entry is got from neighbor AP: *${ap1.mgt0.mac}"

step.desc: -Check the roaming cache detail of STA1 on AP1
step.log-match: -c -i "Roaming entry is got from neighbor AP: *${ap2.mgt0.mac}"

step.desc: -Check the roaming cache detail of STA1 on AP2
step.log-match: -c -i "Roaming entry is got from neighbor AP: *${ap2.wifi0.1.mac}"
